mapper.select: select count(*) from feedback where status=0
select feedback.*, old_users.username,old_users.tell,old_users.address from feedback,old_users where status=0 and old_users.uid=feedback.uid
select feedback.*, old_users.username,old_users.tell,old_users.address from feedback,old_users where status=1 and old_users.uid=feedback.uid
select * from feedback where status=1 and uid=#{uid}
select * from feedback where status=0 and uid=#{uid}
